website_summaries.verdict: A great option as both a moist training treat or a regular snack. Other exotic flavors include alligator, rabbit, venison, and pheasant.
pros: Wild boar is the first ingredient
Made with natural and healthy ingredients, such as cranberries and blueberries
cons: Just under four ounces, a bag of these tasty boar treats can go quickly if you’re not careful

customer_reviews.title: My dogs have NEVER begged for a treat until now ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have NEVER begged for a treat until now. They will sit in front of the cabinet I keep them in and look at me, then look at the shelf. Back and forth until I get the bag out. They can hardly contain their selves.
customer_reviews.author: nfevans

customer_reviews.title: Delicious salmon treats for dogs.
customer_reviews.text: These dog treats are full of nutritious ingredients. I like that these do not contain wheat, grain, and soy. These contain salmon, which my dog loves. I use these to treat my dog as part of obedience training. He loves the delicious flavor, and I feel good about feeding him good nutrition. These treats are soft and tend to crumble, so they can be a bit messy to feed.
customer_reviews.author: Ma'ama

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients but my dogs aren't wild about them
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to offer these to our dogs because they have all the things I look for in a treat: USA made, no GMO or artificial ingredients, no nasty by-products, and they're high in protein and antioxidants. I received the Wild Boar, Blueberries And Cranberries flavor, which sounds good enough for ME to eat. My dogs did eat these but they weren't crazy about them. Being the consistency of soft jerky, I really thought they'd be more excited over them. Still, I would buy these again because of the quality ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kearns

customer_reviews.title: My dog liked them
customer_reviews.text: The package of treats and the treats themselves were much smaller than I was expecting but that is my own fault for not really realizing how small a 3.75 ounce bag would be. My Whoodle liked them but I have yet to find a treat that he doesn't like. My dog has a chicken allergy so I have to try and stay away from treats that have chicken so these are a good option for me. Thanks for taking the time to read my review. I hope you found it helpful in making your purchasing decision. If so, I'd love the feedback below.
customer_reviews.author: ajohnson

customer_reviews.title: I hold my breath when I give my dogs these treats
customer_reviews.text: These treats appear to be healthy and my dogs love them. They have a really strong odor though. I have odor sensitivities, so the odor might not bother others. I have to hold my breath while feeding these treats to my dogs. The treats leave a residue and I immediately have to wash my hands after touching these treats. I have started adding a couple of these treats to the dogs' dry food so that I don't have to touch the treats. My dogs really enjoy these treats and I feel bad that I can barely tolerate feeding the treats to them.
customer_reviews.author: Quoad Toad

customer_reviews.title: Lab says yum!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good option for treats. Our lab loves them. I love that they are bigger if you want to give a whole treat, but they are soft and break into smaller pieces easily if you want to do that. We always break these up and get about 6 to 8 training treats out of one treat. That makes it a pretty stellar deal for us. Ingredients are good, and our lab works for them. I love that it is a smaller bag. I used to not like it, but now I realize that it makes me more mindful of how much I am giving my dog, and that's good for her health!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved these. He was so eager that the third or fourth time I was opening the bag to give him some, he SNATCHED it out of my hand, scattered the contents on the floor and gobbled them up in short order. All gone in less than two minutes. No problems with stomach upset, normal stools so the extra boost of mead did not bother him. He is usually very patient when I am offering treats. I can only conclude that he was extremely enthusiastic about these.
customer_reviews.author: andiesenji

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love Them. Very Strong Smell.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs hecka like these. They smell very strong. As soon as you open the bag you get a very strong wiff and my dogs come running. I break these out when I really need the dogs attention or best behavior. I just used little pieces of these as rewards for being good as I was grinding their nails down. Each square is about 1"x1" and they can be easily torn in to very small pieces for doing training or whatever. Really the only downside is that they may make your fingers smell.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: Never thought my little doggies would like blueberries
customer_reviews.text: A treat for my little dogs that is loaded with high-quality protein for strong, lean muscles and a healthy heart. Blueberries and cranberries are rich in nutritious antioxidants. These treats are GMO, grain, wheat and soy free. They are made without artificial colors, flavors, animal by-products or preservatives. They are so healthy that I thought that they would not like them but they really do! When I bring out the bag- then run to it.
customer_reviews.author: S.E. ENT.

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: I've found that my dog is far more picky than I ever believed a dog could be! The moment I start walking towards this bag, she starts jumping all over my legs. She just can't contain herself! She loves 'em! These are perfect sized snacks for smaller dogs too. If you want to use them for training, you may want to break them up smaller, but these are perfect size for potty training. They almost look like beef jerky to me.
customer_reviews.author: MadROMAD

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller overall than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I have a rat terrier which is a little larger than a chihuahua sized dog and he went through this entire package of treats, he loved them don't get me wrong but the bag was really lightweight and the treats were really small so there wasn't a lot in there for him to have. He didn't have any trouble with his tummy when he ate these so that was nice but yeah they're very small
customer_reviews.author: Kimber Rosee

customer_reviews.title: 🐟🐟🐟  salmony goodness🐟🐟🐟
customer_reviews.text: DOGS all say yum!.. good amount of treats in the bag. They smell just like salmon. ... Dogs LOVE them. ... They seemed very fresh. They are soft and easy for dogs to eat. Love the added fruit ingredients! Like the resealable bag! Though pricey, good quality , clean Ingredients.. 🐕🐕🐕🐕🐕
customer_reviews.author: 🐆😺MeoW😸🐆

customer_reviews.title: Our boys love these
customer_reviews.text: One of the first things I look at for dog treats and food is where it's made. These are US made, so that's awesome. The next is the ingredients. It doesn't get a lot better than this when it comes to ingredients! The last trial, do the boys like them? A resounding yes from both! They gobble them up and beg for more! A big win all around!
customer_reviews.author: Smartly Created

customer_reviews.title: High quality dog treats
customer_reviews.text: We actually didn’t get the Boar flavor but the salmon. My Aussie, Willis rates this 5 woofs! The product has a rich sheen that tells me this will have great Omega oils for his coat. I like that there is no wheat or by-products and it is made in the USA with quality ingredients like blueberries. This treat is winner with our boy!
customer_reviews.author: A. Darling

customer_reviews.title: These are a huge hit with my Standard Poodle
customer_reviews.text: This is a review of Caru - Wild Boar Recipe, Soft 'N Tasty Baked Bites All-Natural Dog Treats My dog loves these treats. I like them because they are easy to break into smaller pieces for training purposes. They seem to be high value treats to my dog so they're great for training.
customer_reviews.author: M. Erb

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Product, But Dogs Enjoyed Them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in the "boar recipe" but received the salmon recipe instead. That said, my dogs enjoyed the salmon recipe very much. These are small bites, but perfect for a tasty "incentive" treat. They were very enthusiastic about them, so I assume they were very tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Reader

customer_reviews.title: strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I have a snobby dog so not surprised she didn’t like it, I have a one year old mini doodle and the smell alone made her refrain from trying it. A very strong fish smell. But I thought it was a great size, soft and easy to chew, I’m sure other dogs would love this but mine won’t go near it unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: Lee4kids

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves these treats! They are soft and rippable to use as training bites. It's a small bag, so these won't last long with his much my dog lives them. The ingredients are good, and they are made in the US. Pup gives it two paws up!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I thought this was a kind of beef jersey for human consumption. I was disappointed when I saw it was for dogs. However, the dog loves Caru - Wild Boar Recipe treats. They are easy to digest, and the flavor must be great, because the dog is crazy about the this treat.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Maines, best-selling, award-winning author, actor, and editor

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great flavor
customer_reviews.text: These treats have good quality ingredients and a nice zip top stay fresh bag. All three of my dogs love the flavor and always beg for more. These work great for training because my dogs love them so much.
customer_reviews.author: J. Worth

customer_reviews.title: My fur babies love these!
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies love these! It was all I could do to get the bag open before they were in my face gobbling them up. They are good, quality ingredients and must taste good b/c they love them and keep begging for more. Overall, if they're happy, so am I!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs hogged these treats down. They loved the quality flavors and ingredients. We feel for 3.5 ounces, the price is just a bit expensive but you get quality. Our dogs are happy babies.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these soft treats! They are great for training too, as you can break them into smaller pieces if you want to. And the ingredients are great, even for my dog with allergies.
customer_reviews.author: SciFiChick

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats, they almost have a jerky like quality to them. However the bag came only like half full, with only a handful of treats in them. So it doesn’t last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves them but package is small
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars because my puppy loves these but 3 stars for the size of the package. I'm in the middle of training my puppy and he loves these treats, but he only gets a couple a day. I would love to buy these if the package was larger.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Simple ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Dog seems to like them, they are easily broken into smaller pieces which is nice. Fancy ingredients and good for those animals needing a product with less mystery ingredients
customer_reviews.author: KatrinaM

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: Not the best smelling treat but my dog loves these. He will do anything for these treats. Easy to tear bag with a re-closing closure.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBooks

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE these.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats. Ingredients are clean, treat size are perfect for med/large dogs. Overall a great, 5 star treat... Only downfall is the price...Bag is pretty small for the price.
customer_reviews.author: F. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Dog love them
customer_reviews.text: I used this to train my new puppy. I would just open the bag and he would do whatever I asked. That is a bonus for us.
customer_reviews.author: VS Grenier

customer_reviews.title: No upset tummies!
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a hgh-end dog snack. My dogs ate them and didn't get any tummy troubles. They love them and come running when they hear the package.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: He loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost a little concerned about how much my dog loves these treats. They taste really good to him and I like how they are used from wild boar and cooked!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Whitcome

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes them
customer_reviews.text: My dog (shih tzu) likes these treats. They are very small. Good for training.
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy

customer_reviews.title: My pup wants more. She loves it
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves it easy for her to eat and digest. Haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Perez

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! They are like a beef jerky and he lovessssss beef jerky. I wish the bag was bigger but I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Good product, my dog really enjoys these treats! Made in USA & family owned
customer_reviews.author: WoodlandFairy

customer_reviews.title: My dog love the product but her owner dislikes paying over 50% ...
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive! You can buy local for a much lower price. My dog love the product but her owner dislikes paying over 50% more than the local pet store
customer_reviews.author: jah1956

product_meta.title: Caru - Wild Boar Recipe, Soft 'N Tasty Baked Bites All-Natural Dog Treats, Made With Real Wild Boar, Blueberries And Cranberries (3.75 Oz)
product_meta.description: Reward your pup with soft, baked goodness with Caru Soft 'n Tasty Baked Treats. These delectable morsels use carefully-selected ingredients. They’re made with wholesome health in mind, which means they’re grain-free and baked in small batches to lock in exceptional aroma and flavor. They’re healthy to feed every day—with no GMO ingredients, wheat, corn, soy or by-products included! CARU Soft ‘n Tasty Treats easily break apart into smaller pieces without crumbling, which makes them perfect for training rewards, or anytime you want to show your pup some extra love.
feature_bullets: These treats are GMO, grain, wheat and soy free. They are made without artificial colors, flavors, animal by-products or preservatives.
Made safely in the USA by a family-owned company. Ideal for training as they easily break apart into smaller pieces without crumbling.
Real meat, poultry or fish is the first ingredient in these award-winning treats.
Meat and poultry is USDA inspected. Fish is FDA inspected.
A treat for dogs that is loaded with high-quality protein for strong, lean muscles and a healthy heart. Blueberries and cranberries are rich in nutritious antioxidants.
